attributes.title: U did that🧚‍♀️✨🌈🌸never do it again💫🧚‍♂️😘
attributes.review: Ok let’s just say I downloaded this app to support our racist President bc who wouldn’t want to do that. Lemme just tell y’all dis ain’t it😒it took like 10 hours to download😤but when it did download the scariest thing popped up on the screen😨it was a giant Cheeto puff tbh it scared me alot😭I’ve never seen a Cheeto in a tux👀cool ig but still scary😖n e way Im very sad because I thought the quality of this app would be better🤦🏽‍♀️to conclude this imaaculate review let’s just say that I’m in da mood for sum cheetos😙✌🏼

attributes.title: This is the worst app I’ve ever used!
attributes.review: For some reason, while downloading the Trump app, my phone completely locked up and I couldn’t use it. Almost like a virus was placed on my phone. The app won’t even open and I can’t delete it!!! Ever since downloading, my phone has been acting very strange and I’m concerned that something fishy was downloaded to my phone via this app; especially because I can’t even delete it now! This app is horrible! Please remove this app from the App Store!

attributes.title: No Thanks!
attributes.review: Me and my husband both downloaded this app. He has an older phone and his phone completely shut down as soon as it was downloaded, after taking nearly 1.5 hours to download. On my phone, which is an iPhone 11, every time I tried to open the app my phone glitched out and was frozen on my lock screen for at least ten minutes. Also, I don’t like the fact you have to make an account just to keep up with his news. Bad App!!!

attributes.title: worst app ever!!
attributes.review: this app is honestly one of the worst apps I have ever downloaded!! the app constantly crashes when I open it up, sometimes it even crashes before I even open it. the customer support is GOD awful, I have called 27 times, yet the only thing I hear is TRUMP2020 or TRUMP. the exterior of the app is disgusting, a white with a blue “T” for TRUMP!??? the interior of this app is an ugly blue with the usa flag and a picture of cinnamon h!tler himself!! i will NOT be returning to this app, I will NOT be recommending this app to ANYONE! I WILL be deleting this app IMMEDIATELY!!!

attributes.title: Worst APP and WORST PRESIDENT ever MADE
attributes.review: First of all, I downloaded this app LAST NIGHT, but it didn’t FULLY download that I FELL ASLEEP. When I opened it this morning, it was STILL DOWNLOADING. I had to wait at least an HOUR for it to FULLY download. When I opened the app while Eating, I CHOKED on MY FOOD when I OPENED the app. I BARFED after that. I don’t understand how PEOPLE that have left FIVE STAR reviews can TORTURE themselves like that. I keep having repeated NIGHTMARES after I DOWNLOADED this APP I don’t UNDERSTAND how BAD an APP can be in the APP STORE. I had to CLEAN my phone because my DOG saw THE APP and BARFED all over my PHONE.

attributes.title: 2020’s worst app
attributes.review: this app took a full day to download and then proceeded to glitch every time I tried to open it. then, after turning off my phone in hopes of stopping the glitches, my phone lost ALL of its data. all of my pictures, messages, apps, etc. are gone and disappeared from the cloud. THIS APP STEALS OUR INFORMATION TO SELL TO RUSSIA. it also brought a flock of vultures to my house. it’s been 1 week and they still haven’t left. they’ve already taken my neighbors small dog as a sacrifice. do not trust this app.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This took days to download and I have great internet also the graphics are so bad I might as well be using a Samsung because I couldn’t see anything it was all pixels and I tried restarting the app and I now it keeps bringing me to an orange screen I’ve also been but before that not only did it take days to download it took even more days to load in I WAS SITTING IN A WHITE SCREEN FOR SO LONG and now my phone loses power so fast even when I’m not in the app and it takes up so much storage.

attributes.title: terrible app
attributes.review: not only did this app take forever to download, but it disabled many of my other apps, and I could no longer use them as if the app has put parental locks on my own phone. Not to mention it emailed my boss and sent a resignation letter because I had to focus full time on the 2020 presidential election. In addition to everything else, the app has somehow been able to hypnotize my dog into reciting all of trumps’ speeches. Thanks to the speeches I can’t sleep, for they are keeping me awake.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!💅🏼✨😻
attributes.review: This Cheeto is really trying to take me life, he’s trying to kill me. Tiktac is my life✋🏼I will use a vpn to use tiktac, YOU CANNOT STOP GENZ WE ARE UNSTOPPABLE!! I mean we’ve fallen in love with serial killers, we ate tide pods for fun, we commented fairy emojis under a killers insta post, we will body slam cops with no regret, and lastly WE WILL GET OUR TIKTOK YOU DISGUSTING ORANGE 🍊 but I do dat so me self, your uh son though on the other hand💅🏼 he’s not like you😻💋he gets kiz kiz💋💋but not you🍊orange must die! We do not accept you you in this world✨😽🧚🏾‍♂️🧚🏿‍♀️mwah bye bye you orange Cheeto! I hope you die in a fire😁😻😝

attributes.title: dont download 😤
attributes.review: so when i downloaded it, i wanted to learn more about my beautiful, lovely president. but then when i did, the FBI came into my house and accused me of watching too many tik toks and said i’m spending too much time in wattpad. Then my family was yeeted out the house. what kind of behavior is this? then my cat and dog were given to the secret animal service. like how dare you? worst of all, i was forced into doing math problems until i got one right 😭 all because i downloaded this app, be careful guys.
